name: Snake (itch) (Arĥimedeς ℳontegasppα)
description:
Just the good ol’ snake game. You need TIC-80 in order to play or edit it.

  • Joystick (or arrow keys) to move the snake
  • Button B (X key) reset the game
  • Don’t collide with borders or yourself!
Palette 1a1c2c591c34b13e53ba7d57245961a7f07038b76425717929366f3b5dc941a6f673eff7f4f4f494b0c2566c86333c57
